segments.text: You look a bit under the weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not feeling all the great . I think I have that crud that is going around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that it ’ s going around the dorms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My boyfriend hasn ’ t been feeling so well . Maybe he passed it on to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have some cold tablets if you would like one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mostly , I feel like I need some rest and hot soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Drinking liquids and getting rest is a good idea with a cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My grandmother thinks that honey and whiskey is a good cure for a cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could always go to the pharmacy if it gets worse and you want suggestions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If things don ’ t get better in a few days , I will look for some other solutions .
segments.speaker: S2
